name: 2b-boilerplate
description: _We're looking at your programming ability. It must not only work, it should be maintainable._

scripts.poststart: echo 'This is the resultant portfolio. Please check data/portfolionode.csv.'
scripts.portfolio: LC_NUMERIC="C" && awk -f portfolio-creator.awk data/transactions.csv > data/portfolio.csv && cat data/portfolio.csv
scripts.postportfolio: echo 'This is the resultant portfolio. Please check data/transactions.csv.'
